alert.note: Alert for Bergen (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 08 at 5:03AM EDT until April 08 at 12:00PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in New Jersey... Saddle River near Lodi affecting Bergen County. For the Saddle River...including Lodi...Major flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Major flooding is occurring and major flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Saddle River Lodi. * WHEN...Until this afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 8.0 feet, Flooding at shop rite parking lot along Memorial Drive. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 4:30 AM EDT Friday the stage was 8.2 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 4:30 AM EDT Friday was 8.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late this morning and continue falling to 2.8 feet early Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 6.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 8.1 feet on 03/07/2011. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (8 am EDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sat Sun Mon Saddle River Lodi 6.0 8.2 Fri 4 am EDT 3.1 2.8 MSG &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued no later than 1200 PM EDT.
